title: Analyze factors that led to the shift to slavery

content.question: Analyze the economic, social, and political factors that influenced colonial southern planters to shift from relying on indentured servants to importing Africans into slavery in the 1600s.

frqParts.text: Analyze the economic, social, and political factors that influenced colonial southern planters to shift from relying on indentured servants to importing Africans into slavery in the 1600s.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
